connectionStrings.verificationDb: <Inject connection string to SQL server per env for release>

ApplicationInsights.InstrumentationKey: <Inject instrumentation key for AI per env for release>

idPorten.clientId: <Inject client secret per env for release>
idPorten.clientSecret: <Inject client secret per env for release | for dev: dotnet user-secrets set idporten:clientSecret your-client-secret>

signingCredentials.certificate: <Inject name of cert in key vault per env (if certificates.locator=local: use thumbprint)>

azureVault.vaultUri: <Inject key vault uri per env if locator=azure>

pseudonyms.key: <Inject base64 representation of key used for hashing ID-porten pseudonyms>

testCases._comment: Configuration used for the test cases if useFixedTestCases = true
testCases.oddEvenInfectionResults: <if true, all results are based on odd/even check (-> negative/positive), otherwise performs MSIS-lookup>
testCases.fixedDaysSincePositiveTest: <number days since positive test for odd/even infection results>
testCases.fixedLimitExceededResults: <if true, verification limit is only ever exceeded by users in limitExceededUsers, otherwise normal limit behaviour>
technicalErrorUsers: <National identifiers of users that will always produce technical error>
limitExceededUsers: <National identifiers of users that should always have exceeded verification limit>
